QuestData.Title: Take The Fight To Them
QuestData.Description:
Our scouts report that Margrave Gharmal gathers their forces at the House of Constructs.
Our necropolis and our new kyrian allies have already begun an aerial assault. I need you to lead our forces on the ground.
Meet me within Zerekriss. We will begin our attack immediately.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the portal to meet Draka aboard the Zerekriss.

Objectives.Objective: Take the portal to the Zerekriss
